summary: Adds a player farm outside Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13862/]There's an SE Version now![/url]

Adds a player farm outside Whiterun named Tundra Watch.
I created this for one of my characters who is a Nord, Thane of Whiterun, and Talos worshiper. I made it quite a while ago and put it on the workshop. I'm just now getting around to putting it on the Nexus.

Things included

Exterior:

Stables with anvil, grindstone, workbench, and tanning rack
Windmill, garden, archery target, cows, goats, and chickens
Barrels, crates, and sacks for storage
Wood chopping block
Housecarl with full schedule to patol and guard the farm while you're away, or he can join you on your adventures.
A dog which wanders outside and can also be a follower

Main house:

Two weapon racks, two weapon/shield plaques, small display case, working bookshelf, alchemy table, cooking pot, cooking oven, butter churn, mead barrel, small Talos shrine, bedroom for the housecarl, bedroom for the player, and a small storage room.
There is no navmesh for the top floor so the housecarl doesn't eat his breakfast in the players bedroom upstairs,which I found to be rather annoying.

Requirements:

Dawnguard (for the dog) and Hearthfire (for the kitchen stuff)

This probably won't be compatible with other mods that alter the same space.
author: phoenix7879
